jobDescription: Location: Mclean VADuration: Long TermMortgage industry is MandatoryJob Description:-Must have experience as BA or SA with data/interface mapping experience-Strong Experience and understanding of end to end ETL process (Source to Target)-Should have exposure in banking domain (loan system)/Mortgage-Strong experience in XML/XSD and JSON-Should have experience in analysis of reporting system, source system (MS-Access/XML)-Should have experience in rule base engine implementation-Experiencing in Informatica power centre or any ETL tool-Experience in EIM Solutions such as Data Modeling, Data cleansing and Profiling, Data Integration (XML), Data Analysis, and rule base engineExperience and detailed knowledge of relational, OLTP, SQL, SQL performance tuning, dimensional and OLAP databases and technologies
